name: Create category models
description: Generate models for a dataset, simulating a root split on a given field

inputs.name: split-field
inputs.description: The name or id of the categorical field used to split the input data

inputs.name: binary-split
inputs.description: If true, a binary split (instead of a multi-way one) is used

inputs.name: objective
inputs.description: The objective name or id, or blank to use the dataset's default

inputs.name: model-kind
inputs.description: The kind of ML model to create: model or ensemble

inputs.name: model-parameters
inputs.description: Additional parameters to use when creating models

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: A map with categories and models, as lists
